trust_partner: your trusted partner in transit and logistics. We provide customized and efficient solutions for sea and air transport, using advanced technology to track your shipments in real-time and optimize your supply chain.
primex_description: PRIMEX Logistics stands out for its expertise and experience in international transit, offering tailored solutions to meet each client's needs. We guarantee the safety and reliability of your goods throughout the process. With our global network of partners, we ensure worldwide coverage for your transit operations.
value_we_give: The quality we bring to your service
mission_description: We are always ready to help by providing the best services for you. We believe a good place to live can make your life better.
customs_declaration_detail: We ensure the transportation of your goods by sea with trusted partners, guaranteeing safety and speed of delivery.
sea_transport_detail: Our customs experts handle all formalities for you, simplifying the transit process and avoiding delays.
air_transport_detail: For urgent deliveries, our air transport service provides fast and reliable delivery of your parcels.
operations_optimization_detail: We aim to enhance the efficiency of your transit operations by providing tailored solutions that address your company's specific logistical challenges.
customer_satisfaction_detail: We are committed to providing exceptional customer service, ensuring that every interaction is centered on your needs and expectations.
continuous_innovation_detail: We continuously seek innovative ways to improve our services and adapt to market and technological changes.
environmental_responsibility_detail: We implement sustainable and environmentally friendly practices in all our operations, thus contributing to the preservation of natural resources.
selectServiceText: Select the service corresponding to the size of your shipment
expedieText: We can contact the relevant department to answer your inquiries. Once your package number is entered and submitted, you will have access to all relevant information regarding your shipment.
exportDetail: Smooth export compliant with international standards.
importDetail: Secure import with fast and compliant customs clearance.
customsClearingDetail: Fast and efficient customs service for hassle-free delivery.
airFreightDetail: Ideal solution for fast shipments and oversized products.
seaFreightDetail: Reliable sea freight service for secure and efficient international transport.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.description: Questions or comments? Just write us a message

primex.title: Our Achievements in Numbers
primex.aboutText: PRIMEX Logistics is a Malagasy international transit company located in Antananarivo, offering comprehensive solutions for transportation, customs clearance, and logistics. We are committed to simplifying your operations with reliable, fast, and internationally compliant services. Our team of experts works to ensure customer satisfaction through tailored solutions. With solid experience, we aim to be the trusted partner for your logistics needs.
